alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, northeastern Nassau, St. Johns, eastern Putnam, east central Clay and eastern Duval Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Callahan to near Lake George. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Fernandina Beach, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings and Jacksonville International Arpt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
